title: Maalai Mangum Neram Lyrics Rowthiram Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Ranina Reddy
Lyrics: Thamarai 
Music: Prakash Nkki
Song: Maalai Mangum Neram
Movie: Rowthiram

Maalai Mangum Neram, Oru mogam kannin oram
Unnai parthukonde ninralum, podhum endru thondrum
Kaalai vandhal enna, veyil aetti parthaal enna
Kedikaram kaatum neram, adhai nammaba maaten naanum

Poongatrum porvai ketkum neram neram
Theeyaai maarum dhegam dhegam
Un kaigal ennai thottu podum kolam
Vazhvin ellai thaedum thaedum

Maalai Mangum Neram, Oru mogam kannin oram
Unnai parthukonde ninralum, podhum endru thondrum

Oru veetil namirundhu, orilayil nam virundhu
Iruthookam oru kanavil moolgi vazhkai thodangum
Nan samayal seidhiduven, ne anaithiduvai
En pasiyum un pasiyum sendhe onraai adangum

Naan ketu aasai patta paadal nooru,
Neeyum naanum senthe ketpom,
Thaalattai kaanil sonna anum neethan
Kalam neram, thaandi vazhvom...

Maalai Mangum Neram, Oru mogam kannin oram ..
..
Pal sindhum pournamiyil, naam nenaivom pani iravil
Nam moochuk kaaichalil,indha paniyum  nadungum
Veedengum un porutkal, asaindhaadum un udaigal
Thaniyaaga nan illai endre solli sinungum

Theendaamal theendi pogum vaadai katre
Thookam theerndhu naatkal aachu.
Un vaasam ennil pattum vaadi ponen,
Vaasam thoonnai naanum aanen,

Maalai Mangum Neram, Oru mogam kannin oram
Unnai parthukonde ninralum, podhum endru thondrum
Kaalai vandhal enna, veyil aetti parthaal enna
Kedikaram kaatum neram, adhai nammaba maaten naanum

Rowthiram Lyrics
Maalai Mangum Neram by Ranina ReddySenganthal by KarthikGolimaare by Haricharan
